thread.title: Adult Swim Just Dropped The Opening Scene For ‘Rick And Morty’ Season 3 And It’s The Best TV Show Troll Ever
thread.title_full: Adult Swim Just Dropped The Opening Scene For ‘Rick And Morty’ Season 3 And It’s The Best TV Show Troll Ever

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: Adult Swim Just Dropped The Opening Scene For ‘Rick And Morty’ Season 3 And It’s The Best TV Show Troll Ever
text:
Some day we’ll get to see Season 3 of Rick And Morty, low-key one of the greatest cartoon shows of all time . In the mean time, Adult Swim is keeping fans on their toes with an “exclusive” look at the opening scene of the third season, which still doesn’t have a release date.
It’s one of the all-time great TV show trolls. We all just got Rick Roll’d to shit.
